resources.string: This application emulates an NFC tag ("Writer") and reads the received data ("Reader") on another device.

There are 3 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 send data with HCE to another device
3 read data = receives the data from the HCE emulated NFC tag
This app works with an emulated NFC tag for reading
This example expects an emulated NFV tag using the AID F22334455667.\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from file 01 will be read.
This app works with an emulated NFC tag for writing
This example sends/writes data by HCE emulating an NFC tag
